lines.gurmukhi: jYsy kCp Dir iDAwn swvDwn krY; qYsy mwqw ipqw pRIiq suqu n lgwveI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a she tortoise bears its young ones in sand and takes care of them till they are sufficiently capable of looking after themselves, such love and concern for parents cannot be the characteristic of a child.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ k`Cp kCU kuMmI bryqI ivc b`cy jMmky iDAwn Dwr Dwr ky hI EnHwˆ nUM swvDwn Apxy smwn hI qÎwr br qÎwr bxw ilAw krdI hY, pr auh b`cy Esy qrHwˆ hI Apxy mwipAwˆ dI pRIqI ivc ic`q nhIˆ lgwieAw krdy Bwv auh mwipAwˆ nUM nhIˆ iDAwn iPkr qwˆG ivc AYfw ilAwXw krdy[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ismrn kir kUMj prpk krY; qYso ismrin suq pY n bin AwveI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a crane teaches its young ones to fly and make them adept by flying many miles, a child cannot do for his parents.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ ismrx Xwd kr kr icqwr icqwr ky, kUMj ApixAwˆ b`icAwˆ nUM prp`k hzwrwˆ kohwˆ dI aufwrI mwrx leI smr`Q kr bxw ilAw krdI hY, ies qrHwˆ Enwˆ b`icAwˆ pwsoˆ mwˆ ipau dI icqvxI nhIˆ sr AOˆdI Bwv b`cy AYfI pRvwh nhIˆ kirAw krdy ik Enwˆ dy mwpy Kvry ikQy hn qy kd imlxgy[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy gaU bCrw kau dugD pIAwie poKY; qYsy bCrw n gaU pRIiq ihqu lwveI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a cow feeds her young one with her milk and brings him up, the young one cannot reciprocate with same feelings the love and affection for the cow.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ gaU Apxy v`Cy nUM du`D ipAwl ipAwl ky poKY poKdI pwldI hY, EkUM v`Cw mwˆ dy v`g nwl crx cugx igAwˆ Es dI pRIqI ivc ihq nyhuM lgw ky ibhbl nhIˆ hoieAw krdw[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy igAwn iDAwn ismrn gurisK pRiq; qYsy kYsy isK gur syvw ThrwveI [102[

Unknown.translation: As a True Guru blesses a Sikh and expresses his love by making him well versed in divine knowledge, contemplation and meditation on Lord's name, how can a devoted Sikh rise to the same level of dedication and devotion in the service of Guru? (102)
